SnapshotOraclev11g.name: DIVEDEPTH
SnapshotOraclev11g.subquery:
SELECT
PEPDEPLOYMENTS.DEPLOYID,
PEPCAPTUREDATA.SPENO,
PEPCAPTUREDATA.PROJECTID,
PEPCAPTUREDATA.SPECIES,
PEPDEPLOYMENTS.DEPLOYDATE,
PEPTAGINFO.TAGTYPE,
PEPCAPTUREDATA.AGE,
PEPCAPTUREDATA.SEX,
HISTOS.DATADATETIME,
HISTOS.HISTTYPE,
HISTOS.BIN1,
HISTOS.BIN2,
HISTOS.BIN3,
HISTOS.BIN4,
HISTOS.BIN5,
HISTOS.BIN6,
HISTOS.BIn7,
HISTOS.BIN8,
HISTOS.BIN9,
HISTOS.BIN10,
HISTOS.BIN11,
HISTOS.BIN12,
HISTOS.BIN13,
HISTOS.BIN14
FROM
HISTOS
LEFT JOIN PEPDEPLOYMENTS
ON
PEPDEPLOYMENTS.DEPLOYID = HISTOS.DEPLOYID
LEFT JOIN PEPCAPTUREDATA
ON
PEPDEPLOYMENTS.SPENO = PEPCAPTUREDATA.SPENO
LEFT JOIN PEPTAGINFO
ON
PEPDEPLOYMENTS.SERIALNUM = PEPTAGINFO.SERIALNUM
WHERE
HISTOS.HISTTYPE = 'DiveDepth'
